definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
(of male friends) to have been through thick and thin together/to be like family/to share the same view of things
lit. to take off trousers to fart/fig. to do something absolutely unnecessary/fig. to make things too complicated

sentences.english: He started to unbutton his pants.
sentences.chinese: 他开始解裤子上的纽扣。

sentences.english: A yardstick slides out of his pants.
sentences.chinese: 从他的裤子里掉出来了一把尺子。

sentences.english: The tight shirt rides up out of the trousers when I sit down.
sentences.chinese: 我一坐下这件紧身衬衫就从裤子里跑到上面来了。

sentences.english: There's a boy in flared pants and a yellow short-sleeved shirt.
sentences.chinese: 一个男孩穿一条发亮的裤子和黄色短袖衫。

sentences.english: I think my legs look stocky , so I rarely wear such short shorts.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得我的腿很粗，所以很少穿这么短的裤子。

sentences.english: Do you know where my trousers are?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我的裤子在哪儿吗？

sentences.english: He said he's coming to open the door as he stepped into his trousers.
sentences.chinese: 他边穿裤子边说他就来开门。

sentences.english: The result is a pair of "robotic trousers" that he calls ReWalk.
sentences.chinese: 其结果是一条他称为“重新行走”的“机器裤子”。

sentences.english: The trousers were bespattered  with mud.
sentences.chinese: 裤子被溅起的污泥弄脏了。

sentences.english: At that time, pants were considered unmanly.
sentences.chinese: 那个时候，裤子被视为很女人气。

sentences.english: Drop your pants, maybe I'll remember.
sentences.chinese: 把裤子脱了，可能老娘有印象。

sentences.english: But for one month, I will wash those pants and iron them.
sentences.chinese: 但未来一个月，我要清洗并且熨烫这些裤子。

sentences.english: I'd like a big T-shirt, blue trousers and red shorts.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一件大T恤，蓝裤子和红短裤。

sentences.english: I oddness, how did Huang Lang Zi and black dog Jing put on a pair of pants?
sentences.chinese: 我就奇怪了，黄狼子和黑狗精怎么穿上一条裤子了？

sentences.english: I did it once, and all the headlines came off on my white pants. On the level!
sentences.chinese: 我做过一次，所有的头条消息都印在我的白裤子上。

sentences.english: He rubbed the cramped hand against his trousers and tried to gentle the fingers.
sentences.chinese: 他把那只抽筋的手在裤子上擦擦，想使手指松动松动。
